text: Rodasar is a town located in the Punjab province of Pakistan. It is located in Lahore District at 31°19'0N 73°4'0E with an altitude of 172 metres (567 feet) and lies near to the city of Lahore.Location of Rodasar - Falling Rain Genomics Neighbouring settlements include Hari Singwala to the north and Bismillapur to the south. ==References== Category:Populated places in Lahore District
title: Rodasar
